short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide sponsored content on web pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enjoy an ad-reduced browsing experience as UnSponsored hides sponsored results, providing a cleaner and distraction-free view. Customise your web search by toggling the extension on or off with a simple switch. UnSponsored is open-source, released under the MIT license, and designed to enhance your online search privacy.

Features:
Removes sponsored results from Google searches.
Toggle extension on or off for a personalized experience
Open-source code under the MIT license

How to Use:
Install UnSponsored from the Chrome Web Store.
Click on the UnSponsored icon then you can toggle the extension on or off.
Enjoy an ad-reduced searching experience!

Open Source:
UnSponsored is an open-source project. Feel free to explore, contribute, or report issues on GitHub. The code is released under the MIT License, promoting transparency and collaboration.
https://github.com/dumbross/UnSponsored

Feedback:
We welcome your feedback and contributions to make UnSponsored even better.
